arts.ttl: Real Madrid injury list and return dates for Borussia Dortmund: Alaba, Diaz latest
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up Real Madrid's injury and suspension news ahead of Tuesday's Champions League clash with Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Celta Vigo 1-2 Real Madrid: Player ratings as Mbappe and Vinicius score in La Liga win
arts.sum: Mbappe opened the scoring for Madrid in emphatic fashion in the first half, firing home from 20 yards out, before a goal from Williot Swedberg drew Celta level at the start of the second half. Goals from superstar forwards Kylian Mbappe and Vinicius Junior secured a vital La Liga win for Real Madrid over Celta Vigo.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Celta Vigo 1 - 2 Real Madrid; 2024 La Liga
arts.sum: Rudiger—6: Attempted vertical passes into Vinicius and Mbappe as often as possible and solid defensively with 3 clearances. Eduardo Camavinga—6.5: Solid 60 minute cameo with Camavinga’s press and blocked pass leading to the opening Mbappe goal.

arts.ttl: Three observations from Real Madrid’s 2-1 win vs Celta Vigo
arts.sum: It’s been said every few weeks that Mbappe is looking like more of the player Real Madrid thought they had signed. Vazquez would do a solid job, but there will be some games where he will be tired and out of rhythm and form, and on those days, you need another right-back who can come through.

arts.ttl: Transfer Talk: Liverpool prepared to fight to keep Alexander-Arnold from Real Madrid
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold has been linked to Real Madrid, but Liverpool will do all they can to keep him. Transfer Talk has the latest.

arts.ttl: Managing Madrid Podcast: Celta Vigo 1 - 2 Real Madrid
arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani and Siddhratth Ramsundar discuss: It also serves as a means for Real Madrid fans to connect and discuss the team.

arts.ttl: 'Extraordinary' Modric breaks Madrid record in win
arts.sum: Carlo Ancelotti praised Luka Modric as an "extraordinary professional" after the midfielder celebrated becoming Real Madrid's oldest ever player by providing an assist in their 2-1 win at Celta Vigo.

arts.ttl: Luka Modric breaks 58-year-old Real Madrid record in Celta Vigo victory
arts.sum: Luka Modric becomes the oldest player in Real Madrid's history as he comes off the bench to provide an assist in Saturday's 2-1 La Liga triumph over Celta Vigo.

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti credits one player with ‘saving’ Real Madrid vs Celta Vigo
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti has on Saturday night moved to lavish praise on a leading member of his midfield ranks. The player in question? Luka Modrić. Real were…

arts.ttl: Three questions and three answers from Celta Vigo 1-2 Real Madrid
arts.sum: Those three worked tirelessly behind them to press the Celta Vigo defence to some extent, but the system once again left gaps which opened up all over the field, particularly on Real Madrid’s right flank where Antonio Rüdiger and Aurelién Tchouameni both seemed to shirk the responsibility of providing some cover to help out their team-mate Lucas Vázquez. Vázquez is now pretty much the only option available to Carlo Ancelotti on the right of defence, but his performance in Galicia left many of the question marks from his critics as to whether he is a strong enough option for Real Madrid to compete.
